name: row_id
label: Unique identifier for the row in Opal

name: mother_id
label: Unique identifier number for the mother

name: child_id
label: Unique identifier number for the index child

name: cohort_id
label: Unique identifier for the cohort

name: CRL_t1
label: Crown-rump length in 1st trimester

name: age_years
label: Age of child in years

name: age_months
label: Age of the child in months

name: z_height_
label: Repeated measures of child's height z-score calculated using the World Health Organization (WHO) reference curves

name: z_weight_
label: Repeated measures of child's weight z-score calculated using the World Health Organization (WHO) reference curves

name: z_bmi_
label: Repeated measures of child's BMI z-score calculated using the World Health Organization (WHO) reference curves

name: aggr_raw_
label: Repeated measures of aggressive behavior, total raw score: aggr_raw_0: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) aggr_raw_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … aggr_raw_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: aggr_age_
label: Exact age of the child (in years) when aggressive behavior was recorded for aggr_raw_0, aggr_raw_1, etc.

name: aggr_instr_
label: Cohort-specific instrument used to measure the aggressive behavior for aggr_raw_0, aggr_raw_1, etc.

name: aggr_eval_
label: Who the test was administered/answered by for aggr_raw_0, aggr_raw_1, etc.

name: aggr_avg_
label: Average of available items comprising the total raw score of aggr_raw_0, aggr_raw_1, etc.

name: aggr_pro_
label: Total aggressive behavior score after prorating aggr_raw_0, aggr_raw1, etc.

name: aggr_pc_
label: Aggressive behavior, percentiles of aggr_pro_0, aggr_pro_1, etc.

name: att_om_raw_
label: Repeated measures of attentional function, raw score of number of omissions: att_om_raw_0: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) att_om_raw_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … att_om_raw_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: att_com_raw_
label: Repeated measures of attentional function, raw score of number of commissions: att_com_raw_0: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) att_com_raw_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … att_com_raw_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: att_hrt_raw_
label: Repeated measures of attentional function, raw score of hit reaction time: att_hrt_raw_0: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) att_hrt_raw_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … att_hrt_raw_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: att_hrtse_raw_
label: Repeated measures of attentional function, raw score of standard error of hit reaction time: att_hrtse_raw_0: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) att_hrtse_raw_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … att_hrtse_raw_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: att_age_
label: Exact age of the child (in years) when attentional function was recorded for att_raw_0, att_raw_1, etc.

name: att_instr_
label: Cohort-specific instrument used to measure the attentional function for att_raw_0, att_raw_1, etc.

name: att_eval_
label: Who the test was administered/answered by for att_raw_0, att_raw_1, etc.

name: att_om_pc_
label: Attentional function, percentiles of att_om_pro_0, att_pro_om_1, etc.

name: att_com_pc_
label: Attentional function, percentiles of att_com_pro_0, att_com_pro_1, etc.

name: att_hrt_pc_
label: Attentional function, percentiles of att_hrt_pro_0, att_hrt_pro_1, etc.

name: att_hrtse_pc_
label: Attentional function, standardized score of att_hrtse_pro_0, att_hrtse_pro_1, etc.

name: att_om_std_
label: Attentional function, standardized score of att_om_pro_0, att_om_pro_1, etc.

name: att_com_std_
label: Attentional function, standardized score of att_com_pro_0, att_com_pro_1, etc.

name: att_hrt_std_
label: Attentional function, standardized score of att_hrt_pro_0, att_hrt_pro_1, etc.

name: att_hrtse_std_
label: Attentional function, standardized score of att_hrtse_pro_0, att_hrtse_pro_1, etc.

name: edR_
label: Repeated measures of offspring eating disorder diagnosis:

name: edR_age_
label: Exact age at eating disorder onset for edR_10, edR_11, etc.

name: edR_eval_
label: How was the medical diagnosis reported for edR_10, edR_11, etc assessed.

name: anR_
label: Repeated measures of offspring anorexia nervosa diagnosis:

name: anR_age_
label: Exact age at anorexia nervosa onset for anR_10, anR_11, etc.

name: anR_eval_
label: How was the medical diagnosis reported for anR_10, anR_11, etc assessed.

name: bnR_
label: Repeated measures of offspring bulimia nervosa diagnosis:

name: bnR_age_
label: Exact age at bulimia nervosa onset for bnR_10, bnR_11, etc.

name: bnR_eval_
label: How was the medical diagnosis reported for bnR_10, bnR_11, etc assessed.

name: bedR_
label: Repeated measures of offspring binge eating disorder diagnosis:

name: bedR_age_
label: Exact age at binge eating disorder onset for bedR_10, bedR_11, etc.

name: bedR_eval_
label: How was the medical diagnosis reported for bedR_10, bedR_11, etc assessed.

name: aggr_wave_
label: Which wave of aggressive behavior measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: att_wave_
label: Which wave of attentional function measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: edR_wave_
label: Which wave of offspring eating disorder diagnosis was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: anR_wave_
label: Which wave of offspring anorexia nervosa diagnosis was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: bnR_wave_
label: Which wave of bulimia nervosa diagnosis was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: bedR_wave_
label: Which wave of binge eating disorder diagnosis was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: int_wave_
label: Which wave of internalizing symptoms measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: ext_wave_
label: Which wave of externalizing symptoms measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: adhd_wave_
label: Which wave of adhd scale measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: adhdR_wave_
label: Which wave of ADHD diagnosis was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: asd_wave_
label: Which wave of ASD measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: asdR_wave_
label: Which wave of ASD diagnosis was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: gm_wave_
label: Which wave of gross motor measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: fm_wave_
label: Which wave of fine motor measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: nvi_wave_
label: Which wave of non-verbal intelligence measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: wm_wave_
label: Which wave of working memory measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: lan_wave_
label: Which wave of language measurement was recorded? From 1 to the total number of measurement in the cohort

name: crae_
label: Repeated measures of child‘s central retinal arterial equivalent (CRAE) (mean value from right and left fundus): rmccrae_: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) rmccrae_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … rmccrae_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: crve_
label: Repeated measures of child‘s central retinal venular equivalent (CRVE) (mean value from right and left fundus): rmccrve_: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) rmccrve_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … rmccrve_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: avr_
label: Repeated measures of child‘s arteriole-to-venule ratio (AVR) (mean value from right and left fundus): rmcavr_ assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) rmcavr_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … rmcavr_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: tortuosity_
label: Repeated measures of child‘s tortuosity index (mean value from right and left fundus): rmcavr_ assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) rmcavr_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … rmcavr_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: rmc_age_
label: Exact age of the child (in years) when arteriole-to-venule ratio (AVR) vas measured for rmcavr_, rmcavr_1, etc.

name: rmcmes_
label: Method used to measure retinal microcirculation parameters (i.e. CRAE, CRVE, and AVR) for each measurement (e.g. rmcrve_, rmcrve_1, rmcrve_2 etc.)

name: mets_ idefics_
label: Repeated classification of pediatric MetS based on the IDEFICS definition (pediatric MetS at a monitoring level when the values of at least three of the components of MetS exceed the 90th percentile)

name: mets_score_idefics_
label: Continuous pediatric MetS score combining all components based on the IDEFICS z-scores

name: cvd_risk_score_
label: Continuous pediatric CVD score combining three MetS components (not including the HOMA-IR/glucose component) based on the IDEFICS z-scores

name: wc_idefics_perc_
label: Repeated WC percentiles based on the IDEFICS study reference values

name: sbp_idefics_perc_
label: Repeated SBP percentiles based on the IDEFICS study reference values

name: dbp_idefics_perc_
label: Repeated DBP percentiles based on the IDEFICS study reference values

name: triglyceride_idefics_perc_
label: Repeated triglycerides percentiles based on the IDEFICS study reference values

name: hdl_idefics_perc_
label: Repeated HDL-C percentiles based on the IDEFICS study reference values

name: homa_ir_
label: Repeated HOMA-IR values

name: homa_ir_idefics_perc_
label: Repeated HOMA-IR percentiles based on the IDEFICS study reference values

name: glucose_idefics_perc_
label: Repeated glucose percentiles based on the IDEFICS study reference values

name: mets_age_
label: Exact age of the child (in years) when the MetS components were measured.

name: alt_
label: Repeated measures of child’s alanine aminotrasferase concentrations

name: ast_
label: Repeated measures of child’s aspartate aminotrasferase concentrations

name: ggt_
label: Repeated measures of child’s gamma-glutamyl transferase concentrations

name: ck18_
label: Repeated measures of child’s Cytokeratin-18 concentrations

name: liver_age_
label: Exact age of the child (in years) when liver enzymes were measured etc.

name: mrivafm_
label: Repeated measures of child‘s visceral abdominal fat mass measured using MRI: mrivafm_: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) mrivafm_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … mrivafm_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: mrihff_
label: Repeated measures of child’s mean hepatic fat-fraction  measured using MRI: mrihff_: assessed within one year of childbirth (>0 year and <1 year) mrihff_1: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 1 year and < 2 years … mrihff_17: assessed when the child was aged between bigger or equal to 17 years and < 18 years

name: mri_age_
label: Exact age of the child (in years) when abdominal MRI (for visceral abdominal fat and hepatic fat-fraction) was measured e.g. for mrihff_, mrihff_1, etc.

name: rhinitis_sx_ever_
label: Ever (lifetime) problem with sneezing, or a runny, or blocked nose  when the child DID NOT have a cold or the flu and was aged 0-1 year / 1-2 years / … /17-18 years

name: rhinitis_sx_12m_
label: Problem with sneezing, or a runny, or blocked nose  when the child DID NOT have a cold or the flu, in the past 12 months, and was aged 0-1 year / 1-2 years / … /17-18 years

name: rhinitis_
label: Hay fever / rhinitis ever, reported at 0-1 yr / 1-2 yrs / …/17-18 years

name: n_wheezing_12m_
label: Number of wheezing attacks in the past 12 months, when the child was aged 0-1 year / 1-2 years / … /17-18 years

name: rhinitis_ttt_12m_
label: Did your child take any medicines against nasal allergy/hay fever/allergic rhinitis, when the child was aged 0-1 year / 1-2 years / … /17-18 years

name: age_trimester
label: Age of the child in trimesters

name: ga_us_t
label: Gestational age when ultrasound in X trimester was performed

name: fetus_biparietal_diam_t
label: Biparietal diameter of the fetus in X trimester

name: fetus_head_circum_t
label: Circumference of the head of the fetus in X trimester

name: fetus_abd_circum_t
label: Abdominal circumference of the fetus in X trimester

name: fetus_femur_length_t
label: Femur length of the fetus in X trimester

name: fetus_weight_t
label: Estimated weight of the fetus in X trimester

name: biparietal_diam_sdsWHO_t
label: Gestational age-adjusted biparietal diameter SDS  in X trimester based on overall WHO-based reference growth curves

name: head_circum_sdsWHO_t
label: Gestational age-adjusted head circumference SDS  in X trimester based on overall WHO-based reference growth curves

name: abd_circum_sdsWHO_t
label: Gestational age-adjusted abdominal circumference SDS  in X trimester based on overall WHO-based reference growth curves

name: femur_length_sdsWHO_t
label: Gestational age-adjusted femur length SDS  in X trimester based on overall WHO-based reference growth curves

name: weight_sdsWHO_t
label: Gestational age- and sex- adjusted estimated fetal weight SDS  in X trimester based on overall WHO-based reference growth curves

name: biparietal_diam_sdsWHOEUR_t
label: Gestational age- and sex-adjusted biparietal diameter SDS  in X trimester based on European WHO-based reference growth curves

name: head_circum_sdsWHOEUR_t
label: Gestational age- and sex-adjusted head circumference SDS  in X trimester based on European WHO-based reference growth curves

name: abd_circum_sdsWHOEUR_t
label: Gestational age- and sex-adjusted abdominal circumference SDS  in X trimester based on European WHO-based reference growth curves

name: femur_length_sdsWHOEUR_t
label: Gestational age- and sex-adjusted femur length SDS  in X trimester based on European WHO-based reference growth curves

name: weight_sdsWHOEUR_t
label: Gestational age- and sex- adjusted estimated fetal weight SDS  in X trimester based on European WHO-based reference growth curves

name: pi_uma_t
label: Pulsatility index umbilical artery in X trimester

name: pi_uta_t
label: Pulsatility index uterine artery in X trimester
